title: Remembering Kobe Bryant
itunes:title: Remembering Kobe Bryant
description:
As the sports world remembers and mourns Kobe Bryant, Bloomberg Radio spoke to the NBA legend just 5 months ago. Bryant sat down with Bloomberg Businessweek hosts Carol Massar and Jason Kelly to discuss life after basketball.

Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
